item.title: First Post
item.description:
Hello, this is my first tech blog created with Hugo + GitHub Pages

‘‘‘bash echo “Hello, world!”

-today’s Mac terminal history
241 git –version
242 git update
243 git –help
244 git -U
245 hugo version
246 brew install hugo
